answers.answer: I am so ready. 31 weeks and I am huge also(to me anyway). My Braxton hicks seem so intense and frequent but no pattern and they don't last long. I am also not dilated or bleeding. It seems like delivery couldn't come any faster.
Im so tireddddd as well, im 31 weeks and cant wait to be o ver.

I'm 31 weeks, will be 32wks on saturday. I have gestational diabetes and my baby girl has measured over a week ahead since my first u/s at 8wks. Dr.  says  she is measuring a good bit ahead but will not change my due date. I'm also a mother to twin boys who will be 3 on Halloween. So yes I'm exhausted and HuGE. .......and ready for her but I want her to stay till atleast the 35 week mark. Hang in there Mama's we don't have too much longer

question: 32 weeks and I can hardly get off the couch and I can't sleep well because I'm huge! Pillows, tea and warm milk et don't do anything to help. Anyone else ready but still have time to go.
title: So so tired!
